name: Truck Wood: Hill Road Mission
description:
Truck Wood: Hill Road Mission 18 is a best driving simulator game. This game will improve your truck driving skills. Due to play this game you will become a heavy duty truck driver. on this game have multiple different types of heavy cargo truck 18 wheelers trailers are available in this game
HOW TO PLAY:,
- Press start button
- Press accelerator for speed
- Press brake button for stop
- Press steering for Move the truck

FEATURES:
- Different realistic cargo trucks and wheeler to drive
- Arrows, steering wheel and accelerator controls
- More than 15 levels to complete
- Different camera positions, cockpit camera included
- Three different projections
